resources.string: Memory card does not have map file.\n in /osmdroid/tile.zip. You must get file from the web.\n To get file, click on download.
Do you want to turn on GPS?
Write External Storage permission allows us to do store images. Please allow this permission in App Settings.
Permission granted, Now you can use local drive
Permission denied, Now you can\'t use local drive
GPS is disabled in your device. Would you like to enable it?
